info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 9 at 11:32AM AST until May 9 at 2:00PM AST by NWS San Juan PR
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.
* WHERE...Juncos, Las Piedras and San Lorenzo.
* WHEN...Until 200 PM AST.
* IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Rises in small streams and normally dry arroyos. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1130 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Up to 3 inches of rain have fallen. OMME Las Piedras reported urban flooding ocurring near Urbanizacion Las Campinas #1, intersection between roads PR-204 and PR-183. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Lorenzo, Juncos, Las Piedras, La Fermina, Jagual, El Mango and Pueblito Del Rio. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

parameter.value: FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON

area.areaDesc: Juncos, PR; Las Piedras, PR; San Lorenzo, PR
